name: Mystery room
description: Wow this room is magnificant.  You know you are in a room but the ceiling has stars and a whole solar system twirling around.  The room is black yet you can see everything because of how bring the solar system is.  There are all manor of immaginative murals on the walls and wonderous items are floating around.  You can not reach anything however because you are too small.  The only thing to do is to find a way out.

exits.description: There is an amazing mural and wonderous things but you can not go this direction.
